name: Chiikawa Handy Fan 3 (Chiikawa)
description:
The third installment of the handheld fan "Chiikawa" (2023 model) has appeared.
This time, it comes with silicon-made ear attachments!
With a compact silent design, the airflow has three levels: 'weak', 'medium', and 'strong'!
The specially crafted package, with attention to detail, is an irresistible item for Chiikawa fans.

Set contents: 1 handheld fan, 1 USB cable for charging
Built-in battery: Lithium-ion battery
Battery capacity: 2000mAh
Charging time: Approximately 4 hours
Continuous usage time: Approximately 11 hours (in the case of weak airflow)

Size:
  Handheld fan: Approx. H172×W75×D29mm
  USB cable for charging: Approx. 80cm
Weight:
  Handheld fan: Approx. 135g
  USB cable for charging: Approx. 20g
Input specification: DC5V/1A
Material:
  Handheld fan: PP+ABS, other silicon
  USB cable for charging: PVC, others
Manufacturing location: China
vendor: 多摩電子工業
